com.sun.tools.visualvm.heapdump

Class HeapDumpSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.tools.visualvm.heapdump.HeapDumpSupport

  • public final class HeapDumpSupport
extends Object
    Support for heap dumps in VisualVM.
    Author:
    Jiri Sedlacek

    • Method Summary

      SnapshotCategory getCategory()
      Returns SnapshotCategory instance for heap dumps.

      Returns singleton instance of HeapDumpSupport.

      Returns true if taking heap dumps is supported for the application, false otherwise.

                boolean openView)

        Parameters:
        application - Application to take the heap dump,
        openView - true if taken heap dump should be opened, false otherwise.

      • supportsRemoteHeapDump

        public boolean supportsRemoteHeapDump(Application application)
        Returns true if taking heap dumps is supported for the remote application.
        Parameters:
        application - remote application from which to take the heap dump
        Returns:
        true if taking heap dumps is supported for the remote application, false otherwise
        Since:
        VisualVM 1.3

      • takeRemoteHeapDump

        public void takeRemoteHeapDump(Application application,
                      String dumpFile,
                      boolean customizeDumpFile)
        Takes heap dump from remote Application.
        Parameters:
        application - remote Application to take the heap dump
        dumpFile - target dump file on the remote machine
        customizeDumpFile - true if the dumpFile customization dialog should be displayed, false otherwise
        Since:
        VisualVM 1.3

      • takeHeapDump

        Takes heap dump from CoreDump.
        Parameters:
        coreDump - CoreDump to take the heap dump,
        openView - true if taken heap dump should be opened, false otherwise.
